items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have to talk to me if he doesn\'t want to.
We have a meeting today at 2:30. It\'ll be a short one.
We haven\'t had those kinds of problems in a long time.
We overlooked Tom\'s name when we sent out invitations.
We probably don\'t want to do that again any time soon.
I wish I could figure out how to embed a YouTube video.
I wonder how many people in Australia can speak French.

It was a lot more expensive than I thought it would be.
Does Tom know that you don\'t know how to speak French?
